unnormalised: Boro, tor tum loan gheuchea babtint vichar kortat? Tem borem, amchea bhovtekam tem korun asa! Mumbaiant tor ami sopnantlea ghara khatir, ek novim ujeachea rongachem motor gaddi, va nimannem tumchea monant dhorun asa toslem vevasay suru korunkui loan gheunk zata, loan hea vostunchea babtint chavi asat. Punn Bharotant loanachea procesak vollokh korop mhollear zaito lok aslelea local treinantlean cholop sarkhem dista - poilech pavtim thodem trasdaik disonk xakta.
normalised: Borem asa, tor tumi ek loanacho vichar kortat? Tem borem, amche bhov jun lok tem kortat! Tem Mumbai-antle tem sopnantlem ghor zait, ek nove dhaktak dhaktem gaddi zait, vo toxench tumhi sodanch dharun ailem tem vevsaay suru korchea khatir zait, loans sodanch chavi zaitat. Punn Bharot-antle puro loananchi prakriya somzonk ek garjen bhorillem local trainantlean vell dovornnek bhasoita- survek thoddok vishad asonk xakta.

unnormalised: Tem sodium-ia, naka? Poilech pavtim, veglea torechim loan asat. HDFC va SBI koddlean ghara khatir loan tor tumka to apartment gheunk sohoiai korunk xakta, jem aspas 80% propertichea molachem aasa. Dusre vatten personal loan, jem bank dita (ICICI sarkhe) jem kosleakai vostun khatir vaprunk zata, logn va medical khorch. Magir asa education loan zaka IIT va IIM sarkhe zageantle degrees khatir vaprunk zata, jem interest rate bank ani courseacher adharun asta. Gaddi loan visrunakat; tumka astapki 85% on-road molachem loan mellonk xakta.
normalised: Amkam tem toddeantlean fodunk dium, kiteak zainam? Fuddem, thoim veg-vegle toreche loans asat. H-D-F-C vo S-B-I-ntlem ghoranchem loan tumkam tem apartment gheunchea lagim pavounk xakta, sadharanponnim propertichea eighty percent meren melounk xakta. Ek personal loan, dusre vatten, je bhov bank dita (I-C-I-C-I bhaxen) te kosleim khatir vaprunk zata, ek lognachi porob vo doctorichi karchik toxem. Uprant shikxonnache loans I-I-T vo I-I-M bhaxen zageantlean degrees bhortele, vyajinche dar bhov bankcher ani coursecher bodlota. Gaddianchea loansacher visrunk naka; tumkam eighty five percent meren on-road price khatir loan melltele.

unnormalised: Atam, tem interest rate. Tem percentage mhonn dakhovpak yeta, p.a. (per annum). Mhonnche, loan agreementant 9.5% p.a. asa, tor tem vorsuki interest tum bhortole. Interest fixed asonk xakta (loan sampunk ek sarke). Va floating asonk xakta (bazaaracher adharun bodlota). Floating rates astapki RBI repo rate sarkhe benchmarker zoddlele astat. Tea RBI rateachea ghoshnecher nazar dovrat!
normalised: Atam, tem adhvani vyajichem dar visrum nakat. Tem percentant dakoitat, p.a. (per annum). Mhonnche, loanacho karar nove point panch percent p.a. dakoita, tumi varshik vyaj ditat. Vyaj sthir zait (pure loanant timch ravta) vo floating (markettichea halchalicher bodlota). Floating dar sodanch benchmarks zoddun ravtat jem R-B-I repo dar bhaxen. Tem R-B-I dharanchi ghoxnancher nazar dovrat!

unnormalised: CIBIL score – ho tumcho credit score, ani to khup mhotvacho! 750+ (900 bhitor) score asa mhollear tum ek boro borrower. Bank tumchem loan pas kortana check korta. Tumchea credit cardanche bil ani EMI vellacher bhortat, bhai! Na zalear, tum “loan rejection” mhonne poreant tumcho score chukun podtolo.
normalised: C-I-B-I-L score- hem tumchem credit score, ani tem mhottvachem! Saat she ani ponchas plus (nove sheantlean) mhonnche tumi ek bore dengekar. Banks tumcho loan mandun ghevche adim tem check kortat. Tumchea credit cardachim bills ani E-M-I-s vell xer ditat, bhai! Na zalear, tem score "loan naka" mhonnche adim talta.

unnormalised: Documentationui ek addchol. Bankank ID proof zai (Aadhaar card no. 1234-5678-9012 kamak yetolo), address proof (utility bil sarke), income proof (salary slips, ITR), ani bank statements nimannea 3 mhoinea pasun. Te documents lagim ani update dovrat; maka visvas, tor tumcho bhov vell vachonk pavtolo.
normalised: Kagdatanchi kamgiri dusri oddchol. Banks sodanch I-D proof zai (Aadhaar card number ek don tin char - panch so saat att - nove shunya ek don zainchay), patteachem proof (utility bill bhaxen), aamdannichem proof (salary slips, I-T-R), ani bank statements aslim tanchea fattlea tin mhoineam khatir. Tim kagdatam lagim dovrat ani navim korat; amcho patyevo, tem tumchem taiarichea vellacho vachounk zata.

unnormalised: EMIs (Equated Monthly Installments) tor tum loan koso bhortole. Tem ek tharavik rokom tum dar mhoinea bhortole je meren loan sampna. Online EMI calculators asat tum dar mhoinea kitle bhortole to sodonk, loan molacher adharit, interest rate, ani tenurek adharit. Tum tankam bankachea websitesacher mellounk xakta.
normalised: E-M-I-s (Equated Monthly Installments) tumi loan koxem fad kortele mhonnche. Tem ek tirkut tumi dor mhoinea ditat loan sarke korchea meren. Online E-M-I calculators tumkam kitlo paiso tumi dor mhoinea ditat loanachem amount, vyajichem dar, ani kall zannunk help kortat. Tumi te bhov bank websitesacher mellounk xaktat.

unnormalised: Loan ek borem sadhan zata, punn tenka jababdarin samballat! Tumchem research korat, veglea bankanche interest rate tulnat, sharti ani niyam samzon gheiat, ani tum EMI bhortole tor tum soko korun bhortale mhonn nischit karat. Borem borrowing!
normalised: Loans ek bori upayogi vastu zait, punn zortendaren samballat! Tumchem shodh launnk, veg-vegle bankanim vyajinchem tulna korat, niyomanchem somzonk, ani tumi E-M-I-s aramponnim vell xerti ditat zaunk pakke korat. Sukhiche dengennem!
